articles.title: Sonali Phogat’s autopsy to be conducted in Goa; family suspects foul play
articles.description: Deputy SP of Bambolim Jivba Dalvi told news agency ANI that the enquiry is in progress and a panel of doctors will be formed for the autopsy. | Latest News India
articles.content: The autopsy of BJP leader and actress Sonali Phogat, who died due to a heart attack on Tuesday, will be conducted by a medical board at Goa Medical College, Bambolim, Panjim. Phogat was brought dead … [+1557 chars]

articles.title: Sena vs Sena: Supreme Court Asks Larger Bench To Decide On 8 Questions
articles.description: The Supreme Court today referred the case relating to the claim over Shiv Sena to a Constitutional bench. It framed eight questions for the larger bench to decide in the battle between Eknath Shinde and Uddhav Thackeray.
articles.content:
A constitution bench will hear the plea on Thursday.
New Delhi: The Supreme Court today referred the case relating to the claim over Shiv Sena to a constitution bench. It framed eight questions rela… [+2396 chars]

articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: BJP suspends Telangana MLA Thakur Raja Singh for remarks against Prophet
articles.description: The Hyderabad police arrested BJP MLA T Raja Singh Tuesday morning for his alleged derogatory remarks against the Prophet in a video posted on social media, amid protests against his comments across the city, said officials.
articles.content: Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Tuesday suspended its Telangana MLA T Raja Singh for his controversial remarks targeting Islam.

articles.title: Non-Hindu minister enters Vishnupad temple with Nitish Kumar, BJP demands apology
articles.description: Nitish Kumar's visit to Vishnupad temple with a non-Hindu minister has angered the temple committee. The BJP demanded an apology from the Bihar CM for hurting religious sentiments.
articles.content:
The BJP on Tuesday demanded an apology from Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar for hurting religious sentiments after he entered a temple with a non-Hindu minister in tow.

articles.title: BJP’s Telangana chief Bandi Sanjay arrested
